_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Fika Headless

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail  # Exit on error, undefined variables, and pipeline failures

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt update && apt install -y wine wine32

chown -R root: /mnt

export WINEPREFIX="/mnt/server/.wine"
wineboot -u

# Initialize directorie
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server || exit 1

# Error handling function
handle_error() {
    echo "ERROR: Installation failed on line $1"
    exit 1
}

trap 'handle_error $LINENO' ERR

INSTALL_DIR="Dummy_EFT"

# Create directory structure
mkdir -p "$INSTALL_DIR/BattlEye"
mkdir -p "Headless"

# Create empty placeholder files
touch "$INSTALL_DIR/BattlEye/BEClient_x64.dll" \
      "$INSTALL_DIR/BattlEye/BEService_x64.exe" \
      "$INSTALL_DIR/ConsistencyInfo" \
      "$INSTALL_DIR/Uninstall.exe" \
      "$INSTALL_DIR/UnityCrashHandler64.exe"

WIN_INSTALL_PATH="$(winepath -w "$INSTALL_DIR")"

# Add registry entry using Wine
wine reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Uninstall\\EscapeFromTarkov" \
    /v "InstallLocation" \
    /t REG_SZ \
    /d "z:\home\container\Dummy_EFT" \
    /f >/dev/null 2>&1

echo "Registry updated and files created."
echo "Note: The dummy files are located at: $INSTALL_DIR"

wine reg query "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Uninstall\\EscapeFromTarkov"
